# Everlasting Rations
## Overview
**Aura** Faint; (DC 17) conjuration; **CL** 5th

**Slot** — 

**Price** 350 gp

**Weight** 2 lb.

**Description**

*This nondescript, small leather pouch has a light blue silk drawstring.*

This pouch contains enough trail rations to feed a Medium creature for one day. Every morning at sunrise, the pouch magically creates another day’s worth of rations.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Create Food and Water (Spell)|create food and water]]*

**Cost** 175 gp

**Source:** Magic Item Compendium (WotC), pg. 160
